page.title: 20Cooperation & Friendship
page.content: The work on this project began in March and continued until August 1985. It was carried out by the Junior class of Dilhorne School. Everyone took part, contributing their time & talents. A great thankyou must be given to all those members of the village who also gave of their time to help investigate and examine life in a small Village. Taking Part: C.Wright,I.Mellor,A.Hurst,J.Barnes, M.Wait,S.Brassington,T.Gilbert,W.Bragg A. Carroll,R.Slinn,A.C.Hurst,R.Watts H.Brassington,K.Towle,M.Colclough, R.Latham,L.Cashmore and P.Singh. Village Help:- Rev.J.Carr,Mrs K. Sedgwick,Mrs V.Dale, Mr&Mrs Wainwright,Mr&Mrs Brassington, Mr.Mawson,Mr.P.Bragg and the village in general. My sincere thanks to them all. P.R.Such Headmaster:Dilhorne Endowed School. August 1985.
